    actionServiceInvoker(Action action, ClientNetworkHandler clientNet)
    Calls the services that are associated to the action if the action is not ignorable An action is ignorable if - It's a PlayAction but the player is not logged in any game or is logged in-game but it's not his turn - It's a MenuAction but the player is in game

      Parameters:

    • toJson

      public static String toJson(Action action)

    • actionServiceInvoker

      public static void actionServiceInvoker(Action action, ClientNetworkHandler clientNet) throws InvalidAction
      Calls the services that are associated to the action if the action is not ignorable An action is ignorable if - It's a PlayAction but the player is not logged in any game or is logged in-game but it's not his turn - It's a MenuAction but the player is in game
      Parameters:
      action - the action to execute
      clientNet - the ClientNetworkHandler from where the action was received
      Throws:
      InvalidAction

    • ignorePlayAction

      private static boolean ignorePlayAction(Action action)
      Returns true if the action is a playAction and is sent by a client not logged in any game or is logged in a game, but he's not the current player
      Parameters:
      action - the action sent by a client
      Returns:
      true if the action has to be ignored

    • ignoreMenuAction

      private static boolean ignoreMenuAction(Action action)
      Return true if the action is a menu action and sent by a client that is logged in a game
      Parameters:
      action - the action sent by the client
      Returns:
      true if the action has to be ignored
